directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise, milk, bacon, Gravy Mix and 1 cup of the cheese in large bowl until well blended.
Spread in 9-inch glass pie plate sprayed with no stick cooking spray. Top with apple and remaining 1/2 cup cheese.
Bake 25 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted. Drizzle with syrup.
ingredients: 1 package McCormick® Original Country Gravy Mix
1 1/2 cups shredded sharp Vermont Cheddar cheese, such as Cabot®, divided
title: Vermont Maple Bacon Dip
